URL Shortener

Shorten your links

All shortened links are public


For Developers :


This site uses NodeJS as its backend for generating and redirecting to short urls generated here. The id to the short urls are generated on an algorithm that nearly never duplicates. The generated id is stored in a JSON file containing the id and Original URL in the key value pairs, which is used to redirect when the request is made.


This project is on github. Link below.
